name: A Hikikomori's Story
description:
Short bitsy game that shows emotional intimacy ( feeling safe to share feelings, even uncomfortable ones) through the times of guilt, sorrow, and isolation.  A Hikikomori 's story is about a man who has locked himself inside his home from the world for years, until one day everything changes...  

Please let me know what you think in the comments below. 

Thank you!
